Text:
Hello ZYX 55E , 

Thanks for sharing this gem in DVD print , Hope you are doing good, this film was uploaded by AB on youtube in VHS print, however i had seen this a long time back on DD. Thanks for bringing the memories back.

Do reply me and plz continue to bring the rare stuff.
Thx for ur comments gaurav bhai. I m committed to bring only gud quality rips no matter how much i hv to wait. U wud hv seen dat i dont compromise on quality. The qlty will keep comin bro. :)
Bring more NFDC and ART stuff if you remember me!!

Thanks Phantom ji for this rare gem.I had posted its request earlier in this forum.

If possible, could you upload Trishagni, Hindola (Farooq Sheikh) and Katha Sagar TV Serial rips too.

Thanks once again !!
